snippet.title: Dead Space Ignition Trailer
snippet.description: Free when you pre-order Dead Space 2, Dead Space Ignition is a choose-your-own-adventure motion comic with hacking gameplay that fills in the gaps between Dead Space and Dead Space 2 available on Xbox Live and PlayStation Network.

localized.title: Dead Space Ignition Trailer
localized.description: Free when you pre-order Dead Space 2, Dead Space Ignition is a choose-your-own-adventure motion comic with hacking gameplay that fills in the gaps between Dead Space and Dead Space 2 available on Xbox Live and PlayStation Network.
